parameters.command:
=set -Eeuo pipefail

############# CONFIG #############
# Como a imagem deve se ajustar ao canvas: contain | cover | stretch
SCALE_MODE="${SCALE_MODE:-stretch}"
# ...

# => PAISAGEM (deitado)
CANVAS_W=1920
CANVAS_H=1080

BG_COLOR="black"
TEXT_COLOR="white"

# Para texto com QUEBRA automática, uso de legendas ASS (libass)
FONT_FILE="/home/node/assets/COMMON/fonts/impact.ttf"
FONT_NAME="${FONT_NAME:-Impact}"   # Nome da fonte usada no .ass (libass usa NOME, não o caminho)
FONT_SIZE=96

SAFE_MARGIN=96     # margens (px) esquerda/direita/superior/inferior
FADE_SEC=0.50     # usado só no xfade de cena (imagem->imagem)
X_PAUSE_SEC=2.5
SCENE_CARD_SEC=1.2
SCENE_XFADE_SEC=0.6
SHOW_SCENE_CARDS=0
SCENE_CARD_TEXT_PREFIX="Scene"

# >>> ÚNICA ALTERAÇÃO: mensagem configurável da pausa curta
PREPARE_MSG="${PREPARE_MSG:-"Get ready. Repeat right after."}"

X264_PRESET="veryfast"
X264_CRF=21
AUDIO_BR="160k"
##################################

WAVEFORM_MODE="${WAVEFORM_MODE:-bar}"     # bar | line
WAVEFORM_WIDTH_PCT="${WAVEFORM_WIDTH_PCT:-50}"  # % da largura do canvas
WAVEFORM_HEIGHT="${WAVEFORM_HEIGHT:-160}"       # altura em px
WAVEFORM_OPACITY="${WAVEFORM_OPACITY:-0.30}"    # 0.0–1.0 (30% por padrão)
WAVEFORM_MARGIN_BOTTOM="${WAVEFORM_MARGIN_BOTTOM:-10}"  # distância do rodapé (px)
WAVEFORM_ENABLE="${WAVEFORM_ENABLE:-1}"         # 1 liga, 0 desliga


# Workdir temporário
TMPROOT="/home/node/download"
mkdir -p "$TMPROOT"
TMPDIR="$(mktemp -d "$TMPROOT/.shadow_XXXXXX")"
trap 'rm -rf "$TMPDIR"' EXIT

LIST="$TMPDIR/list.txt"; : > "$LIST"

# Fonte fallback (para bg quando não houver imagem) + nome correto para libass
if [ ! -f "$FONT_FILE" ]; then
  if   [ -f "/home/node/assets/COMMON/fonts/impact.ttf" ]; then
    FONT_FILE="/home/node/assets/COMMON/fonts/impact.ttf"
    FONT_NAME="Impact"
  elif [ -f "/usr/share/fonts/truetype/dejavu/DejaVuSans.ttf" ]; then
    FONT_FILE="/usr/share/fonts/truetype/dejavu/DejaVuSans.ttf"
    FONT_NAME="DejaVu Sans"
  fi
fi

# Diretório da fonte (para libass localizar pelo nome)
FONT_DIR="$(dirname "$FONT_FILE")"

# =========== Entrada JSON (todos os itens do nó anterior) ===========
IN_JSON="$TMPDIR/in.json"
cat > "$IN_JSON" <<'JSON'
{{ JSON.stringify($input.all().map(i => i.json)) }}
JSON

if [ ! -s "$IN_JSON" ]; then
  echo "ERRO: Entrada JSON vazia. Garanta que este nó recebe o array do nó anterior e Execute Once = ON."
  exit 1
fi

# ==================== FUNÇÕES ====================
probe_dur () { ffprobe -hide_banner -loglevel error -show_entries format=duration -of default=noprint_wrappers=1:nokey=1 "$1" 2>/dev/null | tr -d '\r' || true; }

scale_to_canvas () {
  case "$SCALE_MODE" in
    cover)
      echo "scale=${CANVAS_W}:${CANVAS_H}:force_original_aspect_ratio=increase,crop=${CANVAS_W}:${CANVAS_H}"
      ;;
    stretch)
      echo "scale=${CANVAS_W}:${CANVAS_H}"
      ;;
    *)
      echo "scale=${CANVAS_W}:${CANVAS_H}:force_original_aspect_ratio=decrease,pad=${CANVAS_W}:${CANVAS_H}:(ow-iw)/2:(oh-ih)/2:color=${BG_COLOR}"
      ;;
  esac
}

# Gera um .ass centralizado (Alignment 5), wrap automático e SEM espaçamento entre letras
make_ass_file () { # $1: caminho .ass ; $2: texto
  local ASS="$1" RAW="$2"
  local TXT
  TXT="$(printf '%s' "$RAW" | sed -e 's/[{}]/()/g' -e 's/\\/\\\\/g')"

  cat > "$ASS" <<EOF
[Script Info]
ScriptType: v4.00+
PlayResX: ${CANVAS_W}
PlayResY: ${CANVAS_H}
ScaledBorderAndShadow: yes
WrapStyle: 0

[V4+ Styles]
; Spacing=0 (sem espaçamento de letras). Outline para legibilidade.
Format: Name, Fontname, Fontsize, PrimaryColour, SecondaryColour, OutlineColour, BackColour, Bold, Italic, Underline, StrikeOut, ScaleX, ScaleY, Spacing, Angle, BorderStyle, Outline, Shadow, Alignment, MarginL, MarginR, MarginV, Encoding
Style: Default, ${FONT_NAME}, ${FONT_SIZE}, &H00000000, &H000000FF, &H66FFFFFF, &H7F000000, 0, 0, 0, 0, 100, 100, 0, 0, 1, 1.2, 0.6, 5, ${SAFE_MARGIN}, ${SAFE_MARGIN}, ${SAFE_MARGIN}, 0

[Events]
Format: Layer, Start, End, Style, Name, MarginL, MarginR, MarginV, Effect, Text
Dialogue: 0,0:00:00.00,9:59:59.99,Default,,0000,0000,0000,,${TXT}
EOF
}

# BG puro (sem fade — fade só quando troca IMAGEM)
make_bg_clip () { # $1 IMG, $2 OUT, $3 DUR
  local IMG="$1" OUT="$2" DUR="$3"
  if [ -n "${IMG:-}" ] && [ -f "$IMG" ]; then
    ffmpeg -nostdin -hide_banner -loglevel error -y \
      -loop 1 -t "$DUR" -i "$IMG" \
      -f lavfi -t "$DUR" -i "anullsrc=channel_layout=stereo:sample_rate=44100" \
      -filter_complex "[0:v]$(scale_to_canvas),fps=30,format=yuv420p,setsar=1[v];[1:a]aformat=sample_fmts=fltp:sample_rates=44100:channel_layouts=stereo[a]" \
      -map "[v]" -map "[a]" -c:v libx264 -preset "$X264_PRESET" -crf $X264_CRF -pix_fmt yuv420p -movflags +faststart -c:a aac -b:a "$AUDIO_BR" -shortest "$OUT"
  else
    ffmpeg -nostdin -hide_banner -loglevel error -y \
      -f lavfi -t "$DUR" -i "color=size=${CANVAS_W}x${CANVAS_H}:rate=30:color=${BG_COLOR}" \
      -f lavfi -t "$DUR" -i "anullsrc=channel_layout=stereo:sample_rate=44100" \
      -filter_complex "[0:v]format=yuv420p,setsar=1[v];[1:a]aformat=sample_fmts=fltp:sample_rates=44100:channel_layouts=stereo[a]" \
      -map "[v]" -map "[a]" -c:v libx264 -preset "$X264_PRESET" -crf $X264_CRF -pix_fmt yuv420p -movflags +faststart -c:a aac -b:a "$AUDIO_BR" -shortest "$OUT"
  fi
}

make_text_over_audio () { # $1 SRC, $2 OUT, $3 TXT, $4 IMG
  local SRC="$1" OUT="$2" TXT="$3" IMG="$4" DUR ASSF
  DUR=$(probe_dur "$SRC"); [ -z "$DUR" ] && DUR=0
  ASSF="$OUT.ass"; make_ass_file "$ASSF" "$TXT"

  # Dimensões base do waveform (ex.: 50% da largura, altura configurável)
  local WF_W=$(( CANVAS_W * ${WAVEFORM_WIDTH_PCT:-50} / 100 ))
  local WF_H=${WAVEFORM_HEIGHT:-160}

  # Mapear 'bar' -> 'line' (showwaves não tem 'bar'); engrossar a linha por multiplicação de altura
  local REQ_MODE="${WAVEFORM_MODE:-bar}"
  local SW_MODE="line"
  local THICK_MUL=2
  if [ "$REQ_MODE" = "bar" ]; then
    SW_MODE="line"     # simula barras com linha engrossada
    THICK_MUL=3
  elif [ "$REQ_MODE" = "p2p" ] || [ "$REQ_MODE" = "point" ] || [ "$REQ_MODE" = "line" ]; then
    SW_MODE="$REQ_MODE"
  else
    SW_MODE="line"
  fi

  # Gera mais alto e reduz para WF_H para engrossar
  local WF_HI=$(( WF_H * THICK_MUL ))

  # Cadeia: showwaves (branco) -> RGBA -> remove fundo preto -> reescala p/ engrossar -> recolore p/ preto + alpha
  # Assim obtemos waveform PRETO sem retângulo, com ~30% opacidade.
  local WF_CHAIN="[0:a]showwaves=s=${WF_W}x${WF_HI}:mode=${SW_MODE}:colors=white,format=rgba,colorkey=black:similarity=0.01:blend=0,scale=${WF_W}x${WF_H},colorchannelmixer=rr=0:gg=0:bb=0:aa=${WAVEFORM_OPACITY:-0.30}[wv];"

  # Posição final: centralizado; base a 10 px do rodapé
  local OVERLAY_EXPR="x=(W-w)/2:y=H-${WAVEFORM_MARGIN_BOTTOM:-10}-h"

  if [ -n "${IMG:-}" ] && [ -f "$IMG" ]; then
    if [ "${WAVEFORM_ENABLE:-1}" -eq 1 ]; then
      ffmpeg -nostdin -hide_banner -loglevel error -y \
        -i "$SRC" -loop 1 -t "$DUR" -i "$IMG" \
        -filter_complex "\
[1:v]$(scale_to_canvas)[bg];\
[bg]ass='$ASSF':shaping=1:fontsdir=${FONT_DIR}[txt];\
${WF_CHAIN}\
[txt][wv]overlay=${OVERLAY_EXPR},format=yuv420p,fps=30,setsar=1[v];\
[0:a]aformat=sample_fmts=fltp:sample_rates=44100:channel_layouts=stereo[a]" \
        -map "[v]" -map "[a]" -c:v libx264 -preset "$X264_PRESET" -crf $X264_CRF \
        -pix_fmt yuv420p -movflags +faststart -c:a aac -b:a "$AUDIO_BR" -shortest "$OUT"
    else
      ffmpeg -nostdin -hide_banner -loglevel error -y \
        -i "$SRC" -loop 1 -t "$DUR" -i "$IMG" \
        -filter_complex "\
[1:v]$(scale_to_canvas)[bg];\
[bg]ass='$ASSF':shaping=1:fontsdir=${FONT_DIR},format=yuv420p,fps=30,setsar=1[v];\
[0:a]aformat=sample_fmts=fltp:sample_rates=44100:channel_layouts=stereo[a]" \
        -map "[v]" -map "[a]" -c:v libx264 -preset "$X264_PRESET" -crf $X264_CRF \
        -pix_fmt yuv420p -movflags +faststart -c:a aac -b:a "$AUDIO_BR" -shortest "$OUT"
    fi
  else
    if [ "${WAVEFORM_ENABLE:-1}" -eq 1 ]; then
      ffmpeg -nostdin -hide_banner -loglevel error -y \
        -i "$SRC" -f lavfi -t "$DUR" -i "color=size=${CANVAS_W}x${CANVAS_H}:rate=30:color=${BG_COLOR}" \
        -filter_complex "\
[1:v]ass='$ASSF':shaping=1:fontsdir=${FONT_DIR}[bg];\
${WF_CHAIN}\
[bg][wv]overlay=${OVERLAY_EXPR},format=yuv420p,fps=30,setsar=1[v];\
[0:a]aformat=sample_fmts=fltp:sample_rates=44100:channel_layouts=stereo[a]" \
        -map "[v]" -map "[a]" -c:v libx264 -preset "$X264_PRESET" -crf $X264_CRF \
        -pix_fmt yuv420p -movflags +faststart -c:a aac -b:a "$AUDIO_BR" -shortest "$OUT"
    else
      ffmpeg -nostdin -hide_banner -loglevel error -y \
        -i "$SRC" -f lavfi -t "$DUR" -i "color=size=${CANVAS_W}x${CANVAS_H}:rate=30:color=${BG_COLOR}" \
        -filter_complex "\
[1:v]ass='$ASSF':shaping=1:fontsdir=${FONT_DIR},format=yuv420p,fps=30,setsar=1[v];\
[0:a]aformat=sample_fmts=fltp:sample_rates=44100:channel_layouts=stereo[a]" \
        -map "[v]" -map "[a]" -c:v libx264 -preset "$X264_PRESET" -crf $X264_CRF \
        -pix_fmt yuv420p -movflags +faststart -c:a aac -b:a "$AUDIO_BR" -shortest "$OUT"
    fi
  fi
}


# Silêncio + Texto (SEM fade quando só muda o texto)
make_silence_with_text () { # $1 OUT, $2 DUR, $3 TXT, $4 IMG
  local OUT="$1" DUR="$2" TXT="$3" IMG="$4" ASSF
  ASSF="$OUT.ass"; make_ass_file "$ASSF" "$TXT"

  if [ -n "${IMG:-}" ] && [ -f "$IMG" ]; then
    ffmpeg -nostdin -hide_banner -loglevel error -y \
      -loop 1 -t "$DUR" -i "$IMG" -f lavfi -t "$DUR" -i "anullsrc=channel_layout=stereo:sample_rate=44100" \
      -filter_complex "[0:v]$(scale_to_canvas)[bg];[bg]ass='$ASSF':shaping=1:fontsdir=${FONT_DIR},format=yuv420p,fps=30,setsar=1[v];[1:a]aformat=sample_fmts=fltp:sample_rates=44100:channel_layouts=stereo[a]" \
      -map "[v]" -map "[a]" -c:v libx264 -preset "$X264_PRESET" -crf $X264_CRF -pix_fmt yuv420p -movflags +faststart -c:a aac -b:a "$AUDIO_BR" -shortest "$OUT"
  else
    ffmpeg -nostdin -hide_banner -loglevel error -y \
      -f lavfi -t "$DUR" -i "color=size=${CANVAS_W}x${CANVAS_H}:rate=30:color=${BG_COLOR}" -f lavfi -t "$DUR" -i "anullsrc=channel_layout=stereo:sample_rate=44100" \
      -filter_complex "[0:v]ass='$ASSF':shaping=1:fontsdir=${FONT_DIR},format=yuv420p,fps=30,setsar=1[v];[1:a]aformat=sample_fmts=fltp:sample_rates=44100:channel_layouts=stereo[a]" \
      -map "[v]" -map "[a]" -c:v libx264 -preset "$X264_PRESET" -crf $X264_CRF -pix_fmt yuv420p -movflags +faststart -c:a aac -b:a "$AUDIO_BR" -shortest "$OUT"
  fi
}

# XFADE ENTRE IMAGENS (apenas quando muda de cena)
make_scene_xfade () { # $1 P, $2 N, $3 OUT, $4 DUR
  local P="$1" N="$2" OUT="$3" DUR="$4"
  if [ -n "${P:-}" ] && [ -f "$P" ] && [ -n "${N:-}" ] && [ -f "$N" ]; then
    ffmpeg -nostdin -hide_banner -loglevel error -y \
      -loop 1 -t "$DUR" -i "$P" -loop 1 -t "$DUR" -i "$N" -f lavfi -t "$DUR" -i "anullsrc=channel_layout=stereo:sample_rate=44100" \
      -filter_complex "[0:v]$(scale_to_canvas)[a0];[1:v]$(scale_to_canvas)[a1];[a0][a1]xfade=transition=fade:duration=${DUR}:offset=0,format=yuv420p,setsar=1,fps=30[v];[2:a]aformat=sample_fmts=fltp:sample_rates=44100:channel_layouts=stereo[a]" \
      -map "[v]" -map "[a]" -c:v libx264 -preset "$X264_PRESET" -crf $X264_CRF -pix_fmt yuv420p -movflags +faststart -c:a aac -b:a "$AUDIO_BR" -shortest "$OUT"
  else
    make_bg_clip "${P:-}" "$OUT" "$DUR"
  fi
}

# =========== Constrói TSV a partir do JSON ===========
BUILD_JS="$TMPDIR/build.js"
cat > "$BUILD_JS" <<'JS'
const fs = require('fs');

const path = process.argv[2] || process.argv[1];
if (!path) { console.error('sem caminho JSON'); process.exit(1); }

let arr;
try { arr = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(path, 'utf8')); }
catch(e){ console.error('JSON inválido:', e.message); process.exit(2); }

if (!Array.isArray(arr) || !arr.length) { console.error('JSON vazio'); process.exit(3); }

const ch  = arr[0].CHANNEL_NAME || 'CANAL_SHADOWING';
const vid = arr[0].videoId || String(Date.now());

console.log(`#DEST_DIR=/home/node/download/${ch}/${vid}`);
console.log(`#FINAL_OUT=/home/node/download/${ch}/${vid}/shadow_${Date.now()}.mp4`);

function exists(p){ try{ fs.accessSync(p); return true; }catch{ return false; } }

for (const it of arr) {
  const scene = it.sceneId ?? 0;
  const audio = it.videoMetaData?.file || '';
  const text  = String(it.audioSubtitle ?? '').replace(/\r?\n/g,' ');
  const baseCh = it.CHANNEL_NAME || ch;
  const baseVid= it.videoId || vid;
  const guess  = `/home/node/download/${baseCh}/${baseVid}/${scene}_${baseVid}.png`;
  const img    = exists(guess) ? guess : '';
  console.log([audio, text, scene, img].join('|'));
}
JS

TSV_RAW="$TMPDIR/raw.tsv"
node "$BUILD_JS" "$IN_JSON" > "$TSV_RAW"

DEST_DIR=$(grep '^#DEST_DIR=' "$TSV_RAW" | head -n1 | cut -d'=' -f2-)
FINAL_OUT=$(grep '^#FINAL_OUT=' "$TSV_RAW" | head -n1 | cut -d'=' -f2-)
[ -z "${DEST_DIR:-}" ] && { echo "Falha ao obter DEST_DIR do JSON"; exit 1; }
mkdir -p "$DEST_DIR"

DATA_FILE="$TMPDIR/data.tsv"
grep -v '^#' "$TSV_RAW" > "$DATA_FILE"

# ============== Loop principal =================
last_scene=""; last_img=""; idx=0; read_first_line=1

exec 9< "$DATA_FILE"
while IFS='|' read -r -u 9 SRC TXT SCENE IMG; do
  [ -z "${SRC:-}" ] && continue
  DUR=$(probe_dur "$SRC"); [ -z "$DUR" ] && DUR=0

  # XFADE somente quando a IMAGEM muda (mudança de cena)
  if [ "$read_first_line" -eq 0 ] && [ "$SCENE" != "$last_scene" ]; then
    XF="$TMPDIR/part_$(printf "%03d" "$idx")_xfade_${last_scene}_${SCENE}.mp4"
    make_scene_xfade "$last_img" "$IMG" "$XF" "$SCENE_XFADE_SEC"
    printf "file '%s'\n" "$XF" >> "$LIST"; idx=$((idx+1))
  fi

  # card opcional de cena (também sem fade)
  if [ "$SHOW_SCENE_CARDS" -eq 1 ] && { [ "$read_first_line" -eq 1 ] || [ "$SCENE" != "$last_scene" ]; }; then
    CARD="$TMPDIR/part_$(printf "%03d" "$idx")_scene_${SCENE}.mp4"
    make_silence_with_text "$CARD" "$SCENE_CARD_SEC" "${SCENE_CARD_TEXT_PREFIX} ${SCENE}" "$IMG"
    printf "file '%s'\n" "$CARD" >> "$LIST"; idx=$((idx+1))
  fi

  read_first_line=0; last_scene="$SCENE"; last_img="$IMG"

  ###############################################
  # MUDANÇA: cena 0 SEM repetições/pausas
  ###############################################
  if [ "$SCENE" -eq 0 ]; then
    # Apenas 1x play com texto sobre o áudio
    P1="$TMPDIR/part_$(printf "%03d" "$idx")_play_s${SCENE}.mp4"
    make_text_over_audio "$SRC" "$P1" "$TXT" "$IMG"
    printf "file '%s'\n" "$P1" >> "$LIST"; idx=$((idx+1))
  else
    # Padrão antigo (3 passes + pausas)
    # 1) play
    P1="$TMPDIR/part_$(printf "%03d" "$idx")_play1_s${SCENE}.mp4"
    make_text_over_audio "$SRC" "$P1" "$TXT" "$IMG"
    printf "file '%s'\n" "$P1" >> "$LIST"; idx=$((idx+1))

    # 2) pausa curta (mensagem PREPARE_MSG)
    PX="$TMPDIR/part_$(printf "%03d" "$idx")_pauseX_s${SCENE}.mp4"
    make_silence_with_text "$PX" "$X_PAUSE_SEC" "$PREPARE_MSG" "$IMG"
    printf "file '%s'\n" "$PX" >> "$LIST"; idx=$((idx+1))

    # 3) pausa do tamanho do áudio
    PY="$TMPDIR/part_$(printf "%03d" "$idx")_pauseY_s${SCENE}.mp4"
    make_silence_with_text "$PY" "$DUR" "$TXT" "$IMG"
    printf "file '%s'\n" "$PY" >> "$LIST"; idx=$((idx+1))

    # 4) replay
    P3="$TMPDIR/part_$(printf "%03d" "$idx")_play3_s${SCENE}.mp4"
    make_text_over_audio "$SRC" "$P3" "$TXT" "$IMG"
    printf "file '%s'\n" "$P3" >> "$LIST"; idx=$((idx+1))
  fi
done
exec 9<&-

# ============== Concat final ====================
ffmpeg -nostdin -hide_banner -loglevel error -y -f concat -safe 0 -i "$LIST" -c copy -movflags +faststart "$FINAL_OUT"
echo "OK: $FINAL_OUT"

=set -Eeuo pipefail

############# CONFIG #############

SCALE_MODE="${SCALE_MODE:-stretch}"

# LAYOUT (paisagem)
CANVAS_W=1920
CANVAS_H=1080

BG_COLOR="black"

# Texto (libass): branco + contorno cinza
FONT_FILE="/home/node/assets/COMMON/fonts/impact.ttf"
FONT_NAME="${FONT_NAME:-Impact}"
FONT_SIZE=${FONT_SIZE:-96}
SAFE_MARGIN=${SAFE_MARGIN:-96}     # px

# Encoder
X264_PRESET="${X264_PRESET:-veryfast}"
X264_CRF=${X264_CRF:-21}

# Waveform (quando houver áudio)
WAVEFORM_ENABLE="${WAVEFORM_ENABLE:-1}"       # 1 liga, 0 desliga
WAVEFORM_WIDTH_PCT="${WAVEFORM_WIDTH_PCT:-60}" # 60% da largura  ← (ESPAÇO antes do #)
WAVEFORM_HEIGHT="${WAVEFORM_HEIGHT:-200}"     # px
WAVEFORM_OPACITY="${WAVEFORM_OPACITY:-0.95}"  # 0–1 (quase sólida)
WAVEFORM_MARGIN_BOTTOM="${WAVEFORM_MARGIN_BOTTOM:-12}"  # px do rodapé

##################################

# ============ VARS DINÂMICAS DO n8n ============
VIDEO_ID="{{ $('Get videoId from timestamp').item.json.videoId || $json.videoId || Date.now() }}"

export VIDEO_ID CHANNEL_NAME

if [ ! -f "$FONT_FILE" ]; then
  if   [ -f "/home/node/assets/COMMON/fonts/impact.ttf" ]; then
    FONT_FILE="/home/node/assets/COMMON/fonts/impact.ttf"; FONT_NAME="Impact"
  elif [ -f "/usr/share/fonts/truetype/dejavu/DejaVuSans.ttf" ]; then
    FONT_FILE="/usr/share/fonts/truetype/dejavu/DejaVuSans.ttf"; FONT_NAME="DejaVu Sans"
  fi
fi
FONT_DIR="$(dirname "$FONT_FILE")"

# =========== Entrada JSON (do node anterior) ===========

cat > "$IN_JSON" <<'JSON'
{{ JSON.stringify($input.all().map(i => i.json)) }}
JSON
[ -s "$IN_JSON" ] || { echo "ERRO: Entrada JSON vazia"; exit 1; }

# ==================== FUNÇÕES ====================
probe_dur () { ffprobe -hide_banner -loglevel error -show_entries format=duration -of default=nokey=1:noprint_wrappers=1 "$1" 2>/dev/null | tr -d '\r' || true; }

scale_to_canvas () {
  case "$SCALE_MODE" in
    cover)   echo "scale=${CANVAS_W}:${CANVAS_H}:force_original_aspect_ratio=increase,crop=${CANVAS_W}:${CANVAS_H}" ;;
    stretch) echo "scale=${CANVAS_W}:${CANVAS_H}" ;;
    *)       echo "scale=${CANVAS_W}:${CANVAS_H}:force_original_aspect_ratio=decrease,pad=${CANVAS_W}:${CANVAS_H}:(ow-iw)/2:(oh-ih)/2:color=${BG_COLOR}" ;;
  esac
}

# .ass centralizado, wrap automático, fonte branca + outline cinza
make_ass_file () { # $1: .ass ; $2: texto
  local ASS="$1" RAW="$2" TXT
  TXT="$(printf '%s' "$RAW" | sed -e 's/[{}]/()/g' -e 's/\\/\\\\/g')"
  cat > "$ASS" <<EOF
[Script Info]
ScriptType: v4.00+

# Clip de fundo (imagem ou cor chapada)
make_bg_clip () { # $1 IMG, $2 OUT, $3 DUR
  local IMG="$1" OUT="$2" DUR="$3"
  if [ -n "${IMG:-}" ] && [ -f "$IMG" ]; then
    ffmpeg -nostdin -hide_banner -loglevel error -y \
      -loop 1 -t "$DUR" -i "$IMG" \
      -f lavfi -t "$DUR" -i "anullsrc=channel_layout=stereo:sample_rate=44100" \
      -filter_complex "[0:v]$(scale_to_canvas),fps=30,format=yuv420p,setsar=1[v];[1:a]aformat=sample_fmts=fltp:sample_rates=44100:channel_layouts=stereo[a]" \
      -map "[v]" -map "[a]" -c:v libx264 -preset "$X264_PRESET" -crf $X264_CRF -pix_fmt yuv420p -movflags +faststart -c:a aac -b:a "$AUDIO_BR" -shortest "$OUT"
  else
    ffmpeg -nostdin -hide_banner -loglevel error -y \
      -f lavfi -t "$DUR" -i "color=size=${CANVAS_W}x${CANVAS_H}:rate=30:color=${BG_COLOR}" \
      -f lavfi -t "$DUR" -i "anullsrc=channel_layout=stereo:sample_rate=44100" \
      -filter_complex "[0:v]format=yuv420p,setsar=1[v];[1:a]aformat=sample_fmts=fltp:sample_rates=44100:channel_layouts=stereo[a]" \
      -map "[v]" -map "[a]" -c:v libx264 -preset "$X264_PRESET" -crf $X264_CRF -pix_fmt yuv420p -movflags +faststart -c:a aac -b:a "$AUDIO_BR" -shortest "$OUT"
  fi
}

# Texto + áudio + BG (+ waveform branca 60% colada no rodapé)
make_text_over_audio () { # $1 SRC, $2 OUT, $3 TXT, $4 IMG
  local SRC="$1" OUT="$2" TXT="$3" IMG="$4" DUR ASSF
  DUR=$(probe_dur "$SRC"); [ -z "$DUR" ] && DUR=0
  ASSF="$OUT.ass"; make_ass_file "$ASSF" "$TXT"

  local WF_W=$(( CANVAS_W * ${WAVEFORM_WIDTH_PCT:-60} / 100 ))
  local WF_H=${WAVEFORM_HEIGHT:-200}

  # "bar" simulado: engrossa multiplicando a altura
  local REQ_MODE="${WAVEFORM_MODE:-bar}"
  local SW_MODE="line"
  local THICK_MUL=3
  if [ "$REQ_MODE" = "line" ]; then THICK_MUL=1; fi
  local WF_HI=$(( WF_H * THICK_MUL ))

  # cadeia: showwaves (branco) com fundo removido + alpha controlado
  local WF_CHAIN=""
  if [ "${WAVEFORM_ENABLE:-1}" -eq 1 ]; then
    WF_CHAIN="[0:a]showwaves=s=${WF_W}x${WF_HI}:mode=${SW_MODE}:colors=white,format=rgba,colorkey=black:similarity=0.01:blend=0,scale=${WF_W}x${WF_H},colorchannelmixer=aa=${WAVEFORM_OPACITY:-0.95}[wv];"
  fi

  local OVERLAY_EXPR="x=(W-w)/2:y=H-${WAVEFORM_MARGIN_BOTTOM:-12}-h"

  if [ -n "${IMG:-}" ] && [ -f "$IMG" ]; then
    if [ "${WAVEFORM_ENABLE:-1}" -eq 1 ]; then
      ffmpeg -nostdin -hide_banner -loglevel error -y \
        -i "$SRC" -loop 1 -t "$DUR" -i "$IMG" \
        -filter_complex "\
[1:v]$(scale_to_canvas)[bg];\
[bg]ass='$ASSF':shaping=1:fontsdir=${FONT_DIR}[txt];\
${WF_CHAIN}\
[txt][wv]overlay=${OVERLAY_EXPR},format=yuv420p,fps=30,setsar=1[v];\
[0:a]aformat=sample_fmts=fltp:sample_rates=44100:channel_layouts=stereo[a]" \
        -map "[v]" -map "[a]" -c:v libx264 -preset "$X264_PRESET" -crf $X264_CRF \
        -pix_fmt yuv420p -movflags +faststart -c:a aac -b:a "$AUDIO_BR" -shortest "$OUT"
    else
      ffmpeg -nostdin -hide_banner -loglevel error -y \
        -i "$SRC" -loop 1 -t "$DUR" -i "$IMG" \
        -filter_complex "[1:v]$(scale_to_canvas)[bg];[bg]ass='$ASSF':shaping=1:fontsdir=${FONT_DIR},format=yuv420p,fps=30,setsar=1[v];[0:a]aformat=sample_fmts=fltp:sample_rates=44100:channel_layouts=stereo[a]" \
        -map "[v]" -map "[a]" -c:v libx264 -preset "$X264_PRESET" -crf $X264_CRF -pix_fmt yuv420p -movflags +faststart -c:a aac -b:a "$AUDIO_BR" -shortest "$OUT"
    fi
  else
    if [ "${WAVEFORM_ENABLE:-1}" -eq 1 ]; then
      ffmpeg -nostdin -hide_banner -loglevel error -y \
        -i "$SRC" -f lavfi -t "$DUR" -i "color=size=${CANVAS_W}x${CANVAS_H}:rate=30:color=${BG_COLOR}" \
        -filter_complex "[1:v]ass='$ASSF':shaping=1:fontsdir=${FONT_DIR}[bg];${WF_CHAIN}[bg][wv]overlay=${OVERLAY_EXPR},format=yuv420p,fps=30,setsar=1[v];[0:a]aformat=sample_fmts=fltp:sample_rates=44100:channel_layouts=stereo[a]" \
        -map "[v]" -map "[a]" -c:v libx264 -preset "$X264_PRESET" -crf $X264_CRF -pix_fmt yuv420p -movflags +faststart -c:a aac -b:a "$AUDIO_BR" -shortest "$OUT"
    else
      ffmpeg -nostdin -hide_banner -loglevel error -y \
        -i "$SRC" -f lavfi -t "$DUR" -i "color=size=${CANVAS_W}x${CANVAS_H}:rate=30:color=${BG_COLOR}" \
        -filter_complex "[1:v]ass='$ASSF':shaping=1:fontsdir=${FONT_DIR},format=yuv420p,fps=30,setsar=1[v];[0:a]aformat=sample_fmts=fltp:sample_rates=44100:channel_layouts=stereo[a]" \
        -map "[v]" -map "[a]" -c:v libx264 -preset "$X264_PRESET" -crf $X264_CRF -pix_fmt yuv420p -movflags +faststart -c:a aac -b:a "$AUDIO_BR" -shortest "$OUT"
    fi
  fi
}

# Silêncio + Texto (sem waveform)
make_silence_with_text () { # $1 OUT, $2 DUR, $3 TXT, $4 IMG
  local OUT="$1" DUR="$2" TXT="$3" IMG="$4" ASSF
  ASSF="$OUT.ass"; make_ass_file "$ASSF" "$TXT"
  if [ -n "${IMG:-}" ] && [ -f "$IMG" ]; then
    ffmpeg -nostdin -hide_banner -loglevel error -y \
      -loop 1 -t "$DUR" -i "$IMG" -f lavfi -t "$DUR" -i "anullsrc=channel_layout=stereo:sample_rate=44100" \
      -filter_complex "[0:v]$(scale_to_canvas)[bg];[bg]ass='$ASSF':shaping=1:fontsdir=${FONT_DIR},format=yuv420p,fps=30,setsar=1[v];[1:a]aformat=sample_fmts=fltp:sample_rates=44100:channel_layouts=stereo[a]" \
      -map "[v]" -map "[a]" -c:v libx264 -preset "$X264_PRESET" -crf $X264_CRF -pix_fmt yuv420p -movflags +faststart -c:a aac -b:a "$AUDIO_BR" -shortest "$OUT"
  else
    ffmpeg -nostdin -hide_banner -loglevel error -y \
      -f lavfi -t "$DUR" -i "color=size=${CANVAS_W}x${CANVAS_H}:rate=30:color=${BG_COLOR}" -f lavfi -t "$DUR" -i "anullsrc=channel_layout=stereo:sample_rate=44100" \
      -filter_complex "[0:v]ass='$ASSF':shaping=1:fontsdir=${FONT_DIR},format=yuv420p,fps=30,setsar=1[v];[1:a]aformat=sample_fmts=fltp:sample_rates=44100:channel_layouts=stereo[a]" \
      -map "[v]" -map "[a]" -c:v libx264 -preset "$X264_PRESET" -crf $X264_CRF -pix_fmt yuv420p -movflags +faststart -c:a aac -b:a "$AUDIO_BR" -shortest "$OUT"
  fi
}

# Xfade entre cenas (TOGETHER -> LISTEN)
make_scene_xfade () { # $1 P, $2 N, $3 OUT, $4 DUR
  local P="$1" N="$2" OUT="$3" DUR="$4"
  ffmpeg -nostdin -hide_banner -loglevel error -y \
    -loop 1 -t "$DUR" -i "$P" -loop 1 -t "$DUR" -i "$N" -f lavfi -t "$DUR" -i "anullsrc=channel_layout=stereo:sample_rate=44100" \
    -filter_complex "[0:v]$(scale_to_canvas)[a0];[1:v]$(scale_to_canvas)[a1];[a0][a1]xfade=transition=fade:duration=${DUR}:offset=0,format=yuv420p,setsar=1,fps=30[v];[2:a]aformat=sample_fmts=fltp:sample_rates=44100:channel_layouts=stereo[a]" \
    -map "[v]" -map "[a]" -c:v libx264 -preset "$X264_PRESET" -crf $X264_CRF -pix_fmt yuv420p -movflags +faststart -c:a aac -b:a "$AUDIO_BR" -shortest "$OUT"
}

# ======== TSV a partir do JSON (sem BG da linha; BG é fixo por “passo”) ========
BUILD_JS="$TMPDIR/build.js"
cat > "$BUILD_JS" <<'JS'
const fs = require('fs');
const env = process.env;

const path = process.argv[2];
let arr;
try { arr = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(path, 'utf8')); }
catch(e){ console.error('JSON inválido:', e.message); process.exit(2); }

if (!Array.isArray(arr) || !arr.length) { console.error('JSON vazio'); process.exit(3); }

const ch  = env.CHANNEL_NAME || arr[0].CHANNEL_NAME || 'CANAL_SHADOWING';
const vid = env.VIDEO_ID     || arr[0].videoId      || String(Date.now());

const outDir  = `/home/node/download/${ch}/${vid}`;
const outName = `shadow_${vid}.mp4`;

console.log(`#DEST_DIR=${outDir}`);
console.log(`#FINAL_OUT=${outDir}/${outName}`);
console.log(`#VIDEO_ID=${vid}`);
console.log(`#CHANNEL_NAME=${ch}`);

// Para cada item, só emitimos: audio|texto|scene
for (const it of arr) {
  const scene = it.sceneId ?? 0;
  const audio = it.videoMetaData?.file || '';
  const text  = String(it.audioSubtitle ?? '').replace(/\r?\n/g, ' ');
  console.log([audio, text, scene].join('|'));
}
JS

TSV_RAW="$TMPDIR/raw.tsv"
node "$BUILD_JS" "$IN_JSON" > "$TSV_RAW"

DEST_DIR=$(grep '^#DEST_DIR=' "$TSV_RAW" | head -n1 | cut -d'=' -f2-)
FINAL_OUT=$(grep '^#FINAL_OUT=' "$TSV_RAW" | head -n1 | cut -d'=' -f2-)
[ -n "$DEST_DIR" ] || { echo "Falha ao obter DEST_DIR"; exit 1; }
mkdir -p "$DEST_DIR"

DATA_FILE="$TMPDIR/data.tsv"
grep -v '^#' "$TSV_RAW" > "$DATA_FILE"

# ================= Loop principal =================
last_scene=""; idx=0; read_first_line=1
exec 9< "$DATA_FILE"
while IFS='|' read -r -u 9 SRC TXT SCENE; do
  [ -n "${SRC:-}" ] || continue
  DUR=$(probe_dur "$SRC"); [ -z "$DUR" ] && DUR=0

  # Inter-cena: xfade TOGETHER -> LISTEN
  if [ "$read_first_line" -eq 0 ] && [ "$SCENE" != "$last_scene" ]; then
    XF="$TMPDIR/part_$(printf "%03d" "$idx")_xfade_scene_${last_scene}_to_${SCENE}.mp4"
    make_scene_xfade "$TOGETHER_IMG" "$LISTEN_IMG" "$XF" "${SCENE_XFADE_SEC:-0.6}"
    printf "file '%s'\n" "$XF" >> "$LIST"; idx=$((idx+1))
  fi
  read_first_line=0; last_scene="$SCENE"

  # ===== Ciclo de 3 passes com BG fixos =====
  # 1) LISTEN: áudio + texto + waveform branca no rodapé
  P1="$TMPDIR/part_$(printf "%03d" "$idx")_listen_s${SCENE}.mp4"
  make_text_over_audio "$SRC" "$P1" "$TXT" "$LISTEN_IMG"
  printf "file '%s'\n" "$P1" >> "$LIST"; idx=$((idx+1))

  # xfade LISTEN -> REPEAT
  if [ "${SCENE_XFADE_SEC:-0.6}" != "0" ]; then
    X1="$TMPDIR/part_$(printf "%03d" "$idx")_xfade_listen_to_repeat_s${SCENE}.mp4"
    make_scene_xfade "$LISTEN_IMG" "$REPEAT_IMG" "$X1" "${SCENE_XFADE_SEC:-0.6}"
    printf "file '%s'\n" "$X1" >> "$LIST"; idx=$((idx+1))
  fi

  # 2) REPEAT: silêncio do tamanho do áudio + texto (sem waveform)
  PR="$TMPDIR/part_$(printf "%03d" "$idx")_repeat_s${SCENE}.mp4"
  make_silence_with_text "$PR" "$DUR" "$TXT" "$REPEAT_IMG"
  printf "file '%s'\n" "$PR" >> "$LIST"; idx=$((idx+1))

  # xfade REPEAT -> TOGETHER
  if [ "${SCENE_XFADE_SEC:-0.6}" != "0" ]; then
    X2="$TMPDIR/part_$(printf "%03d" "$idx")_xfade_repeat_to_together_s${SCENE}.mp4"
    make_scene_xfade "$REPEAT_IMG" "$TOGETHER_IMG" "$X2" "${SCENE_XFADE_SEC:-0.6}"
    printf "file '%s'\n" "$X2" >> "$LIST"; idx=$((idx+1))
  fi

  # 3) TOGETHER: replay do áudio + texto + waveform branca no rodapé
  P3="$TMPDIR/part_$(printf "%03d" "$idx")_together_s${SCENE}.mp4"
  make_text_over_audio "$SRC" "$P3" "$TXT" "$TOGETHER_IMG"
  printf "file '%s'\n" "$P3" >> "$LIST"; idx=$((idx+1))
done
exec 9<&-

# Concat final
ffmpeg -nostdin -hide_banner -loglevel error -y -f concat -safe 0 -i "$LIST" -c copy -movflags +faststart "$FINAL_OUT"
echo "OK: $FINAL_OUT"
